description: This file contains SQL statements that implement Row Level Security (RLS) policies for various tables related to a game backend, including users, zones, missions, notifications, and activity logs. It defines policies for viewing, inserting, updating, and deleting records, as well as helper functions used within the policies.

methods.name: user_owns_zone
methods.description: Checks if a user owns a specific zone based on zone ID and user ID.

methods.name: zone_is_attackable
methods.description: Determines if a zone is attackable by the user, based on zone owner.

methods.name: is_authenticated
methods.description: Verifies whether the current session is authenticated.
